name: copilotprompts-m365-generate-pbi-dashboard
title: Generate a Power BI Dashboard Specification
shortDescription: An AI agent that generates a detailed specification for a Power BI dashboard based on project data.
longDescription: The agent is designed to create a comprehensive specification for a Power BI dashboard, including key performance indicators (KPIs), recommended visuals, data model structure, DAX measures, and design elements. This helps users quickly set up effective dashboards for data analysis and reporting.

thumbnails.alt: Generate a Power BI Dashboard Specification
